TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplateParser extends System.Web.UI.BaseParser
Public MustInherit Class TemplateParser Inherits BaseParser
public ref class TemplateParser abstract : System::Web::UI::BaseParser

Docs.summary: Serves as the abstract base class for ASP.NET file parsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateParser> class provides the common functionality for parser classes. Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateParser> class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.

Docs.param: The physical path of the file to parse. has precedence over .
The virtual path of the file to parse.
Docs.summary: Parses the content of the file that is specified by either its virtual or physical path.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If a physical path is specified, it is used over the virtual path for locating the file to parse.
If the path to the file to parse is a circular reference; that is, it refers to the same file that the parser is currently parsing, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: or refers to the file currently being parsed.
